name: ScaleSelector
0:
”Alexa, open Scale Selector”
”Alexa, ask Scale Selector for my next scale”
”Alexa, ask Scale Selector for a grade three piano scale”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scale selector
des:
Scale Selector is a skill that helps you learn scales for your musical instrument exams.

The data it uses is based on the exams offered by ABRSM (see https://www.abrsm.org/our-exams for full details).

Note that, at the time of publication, the scale information for only some instruments is available within the skill. If your instrument is not available, please leave a review and I'll prioritize adding it.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
